task.title: Receive Fax through a Dedicated Trunk
task.shortdesc: You can assign one or more trunks to receive faxes, and tell your customers to send faxes to the dedicated trunk number.

taskbody.context: To receive a fax on the PBX, you need to install S2 module or SO module on the PBX, and connect a fax machine to the FXS port on the PBX.

step.cmd: Go to Settings PBX Call Control Inbound Route , click Add.
On the configuration page, select the dedicated trunk to the Selected box.

info.note: The selected trunk will be used to receive faxes only, users cannot make audio calls through the selected trunk.

step.cmd: Set the Destination to an FXS extension or Fax to Email.
step.info: If you choose a FXS extension, your fax machine should be connected the relevant FXS port on the PBX.

taskbody.result: Users can dial the number of the dedicated trunk, then send fax to the PBX.
